title: Chief Technology Officer
shortDescription:
- Unify and modernize a 17+ product portfolio into a single scalable, cloud-first, AI-enabled platform.
- Lead a globally distributed engineering org (150–500+ engineers) across multiple hubs (US/India/Europe).
- Drive platform simplification, engineering KPIs/operating cadence, and cost/quality improvements in a PE-backed environment.
- Customer-facing with enterprise accounts; support future M&A diligence and integrations.
fitRationale:
- Strong match to platform consolidation + architecture governance + operating-model work at scale.
- AI-enabled platform shift + multi-product unification is a clean enterprise transformation narrative.
- PE value-creation framing (cost/velocity/quality) aligns with trust + performance at scale execution discipline.

title: Senior Vice President of Data & Infrastructure
shortDescription:
- Report to CTO; oversee 80–100 engineers across data infrastructure (ingestion, prediction, measurement, exchanges).
- Own build/buy/partner strategy for data + infra; drive impact across ambiguous problem spaces.
- Lead a US-based remote engineering org with strong cross-functional collaboration.
- Healthcare context implies high governance/privacy requirements.
fitRationale:
- Very aligned to enterprise data platform leadership + AI/analytics enablement at org scale.
- Strong data-as-product leadership role with room to shape governance, standards, and execution rigor.
- Regulated domain (healthcare) matches your governance/compliance focus.

title: Sr. Director, Data Platform Engineering & Operations
shortDescription:
- Lead SIE’s data + AI platform ecosystem (streaming/ingestion/warehouse, governance/observability).
- Operate at massive scale (millions of users; billions of data points/day).
- Stack mentions: Kafka, Databricks, Snowflake; governance tools (Alation/Collibra).
- Bay Area role (San Mateo).
fitRationale:
- Enterprise-scale data/platform leadership with explicit governance + observability responsibilities.
- Strong bridge to AI platform strategy (Databricks/Snowflake + AI/ML adoption).
- Big-org cross-functional leadership very close to your current operating environment.

title: Director, Engineering - Databricks Mosaic AI
shortDescription:
- Lead teams building Mosaic AI products at the NYC AI Engineering Hub.
- Partner with product and research to launch and scale ML/GenAI capabilities for enterprise customers.
- Define the future of AI and data applications on the Databricks platform.
fitRationale:
- High-signal AI platform leadership role with enterprise adoption impact.
- Strong fit for your narrative on governed, scalable AI delivery across data platforms.
- Cross-functional product + research alignment mirrors your context-graph and platform strategy work.

title: Director of Engineering, Cyberbank Core
shortDescription:
- Lead technical strategy and execution for next-gen core banking platform (Cyberbank Core).
- Build services, infrastructure, and data pipelines for a scalable, secure banking platform.
- Manage multiple teams and align cross-functional stakeholders to accelerate product delivery.
fitRationale:
- Regulated fintech platform leadership with strong security/compliance expectations.
- Data pipelines + platform services scope aligns with your data platform governance themes.
- Multi-team leadership in a large fintech aligns with enterprise-scale operating models.

title: Director of Engineering - Data Platform
shortDescription:
- Own multi-year strategy and roadmap for an AI-ready data platform with governance, lineage, and quality.
- Establish platform standards (SLAs, observability, access controls, data quality monitoring).
- Define certified data products and enable self-serve analytics and ML/AI workflows.
- Lead and scale a data platform org reporting to Head of Data.
fitRationale:
- Direct alignment with your AI governance + trusted data product narratives.
- Emphasis on lineage, certified data products, and access control mirrors your context-graph/trust at scale themes.
- Healthcare domain strengthens the compliance and auditability story.

title: Director, Data Engineering & Analytics
shortDescription:
- Lead a data org processing millions of utility bills per month with high reliability and scale.
- Own data infrastructure strategy, enterprise data modeling, and unified data architecture.
- Optimize Snowflake-based data platform and governance for quality/compliance.
- Build analytics structures to drive enterprise decision-making.
fitRationale:
- Strong enterprise data-platform mandate with governance and compliance emphasis.
- Energy/utility data scale aligns with your platform + reliability story.
- Clear multi-year data architecture leadership scope.

title: Chief Architect
shortDescription:
- Lead modernization and integration of VA enrollment systems into a unified platform.
- Design scalable, secure, interoperable solutions with microservices, APIs, and data pipelines.
- Ensure compliance with federal standards (FedRAMP, FISMA, HIPAA, IRS 1075).
- Drive DevSecOps adoption and cloud-native deployments.
fitRationale:
- Heavy compliance + security focus aligns to your governance/trust positioning.
- Enterprise architecture scope across legacy integration and modernization.
- Federal-scale, mission-critical systems fit your reliability narrative.

title: Chief Architect
shortDescription:
- Set next-gen architecture vision for Deluxe products & platforms with a payments focus.
- Define integrated payments platform blueprint and ecosystem evolution.
- Lead and mentor an enterprise architecture team; partner with product/engineering leadership.
- Champion scalable, resilient, interoperable solutions across partner ecosystems.
fitRationale:
- Payments platform modernization + enterprise architecture leadership aligns with your platform governance DNA.
- Strong cross-functional influence at executive level fits your operating-model experience.
- Regulated payments context supports your trust-at-scale narrative.

title: Head of Platform Engineering
shortDescription:
- Own platform strategy and lead a small DevOps/infra team reporting to the CTO.
- Drive scalable, secure infrastructure and DevOps culture; remove bottlenecks.
- Stay hands-on as a staff/principal engineer for architecture and critical code paths.
- Support rapid growth across digital-dollar products and infrastructure.
fitRationale:
- Head-of-platform scope with security and scalability emphasis.
- Financial infrastructure angle matches governance + reliability themes.
- Smaller org, but high-impact platform ownership.
